tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robots (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(50),
   model VARCHAR(50),
   energy_level DECIMAL(10,2),
   creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
   robot_id INT,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   energy_used DECIMAL(10,2),
   PRIMARY KEY (robot_id, timestamp),
   FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robots(id)
);

CREATE TABLE RobotLocation (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE EnergyLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RobotStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    status TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    details TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
);
